Travel Itinerary: Tokyo, Japan
April 10-17, 2024

Day 1 - Arrival
Arrive at Narita Airport around 4pm local time. Take Narita Express to Shinjuku Station. Check into hotel and rest after long flight. Maybe grab convenience store dinner if hungry.

Day 2 - Shinjuku and Shibuya
Morning walk through Shinjuku Gyoen garden. Afternoon shopping in Shibuya and see the famous crossing. Evening dinner in Shibuya area.

Day 3 - Traditional Tokyo
Visit Senso-ji Temple in Asakusa. Explore Ueno Park and museums. Try street food around Ameyoko market.

Day 4 - Day trip to Nikko
Early train to see temples and shrines. Beautiful nature if weather cooperates. Return evening.

Day 5 - Harajuku and Meiji
Meiji Shrine in morning. Harajuku for lunch and people watching. Omotesando for upscale shopping.

Day 6 - Akihabara and East Side
Electronics and anime district. Teamlab Borderless digital art museum if time allows.

Day 7 - Departure
Pack and check out. Last minute shopping at airport. Flight departs 6pm.
